title: 1904: Merlimont premier vol de Gabriel Voisin - sur le planeur Archdeacon (from "The Lartigue Portfolio" 1903-1916")
inscriptions: l.r. in ink on photograph: 683/5000 U.S.; on mount in gold lettering: 1904 - MERLIMONT PREMIER VOL DE GABRIEL VOISIN-/ SUR LE PLANEUR ARCHDEACON; l.c. blind stamped: [Lartique supervision stamp]; in ink on inside portfolio case: 683/ J.H.LARTIGUE [sun-like symbol]
